pageContext.claim: “Well, as an example, the workers are going to get $3,000 for a family of four. They're going to get all sorts of things that they, frankly, in many cases, they wouldn't have even gotten if they had the job, if they didn't have to go through this hell.”
pageContext.analysis: The program was designed to hit average wages. So some people could take home more and others could take home less. However, the loss of a job can also mean the loss of insurance — so there are “all sorts of things” people will not get even if their unemployment is more than their original salary.
